wordpressWpcContributors.bio: Christine is a Sales Director at CampusPress (sister company to Edublogs and WPMU DEV) that hosts WordPress sites for schools around the world. Prior to this position she worked at James Madison University where she managed their WordPress network and supported faculty in integrating technology within their classrooms.

author.bio: Ronnie leads the team behind the CampusPress, Edublogs, and WPMU DEV Hosting services, which power thousands of WordPress sites for higher ed institutions small and large. A former educator, wannabe musician and math nerd, Ronnie is a Longhorn football-obsessed resident of Austin, Texas.

Christine is a Sales Director at CampusPress (sister company to Edublogs and WPMU DEV) that hosts WordPress sites for schools around the world. Prior to this position she worked at James Madison University where she managed their WordPress network and supported faculty in integrating technology within their classrooms.

content.raw: Ronnie leads the team behind the CampusPress, Edublogs, and WPMU DEV Hosting services, which power thousands of WordPress sites for higher ed institutions small and large. He got his start on the web doing web accessibility audits at The University of Texas nearly 20 years ago. A former educator, wannabe musician and math nerd, Ronnie lives in Austin, Texas.

content.raw: What’s a content creator to do when it comes to ensuring their site is compliant and usable by everyone? We’ll showcase our free accessibility plugins, themes, and resources that are available to all.
